contents: Article 17 (Convocation) ① The chairperson convenes the standing committee as necessary and becomes the chairperson. However, when the chairperson is unable to perform his/her duties due to unavoidable reasons, the vice-chairperson becomes the chairperson in the order determined by the chairperson when appointing the vice-chairperson. ② If the person with the authority to convene the Standing Committee avoids convening the Standing Committee, the Standing Committee may be convened with the consent of more than two-thirds of the registered Standing Committee members. [This Article Newly Inserted on May 15, 2017]
